Welcome to the CS League Hackathon! Here you will have to find the flag(anwser) by hacking. There are three problems that you can complete all with different difficulties. Once you find the flags, you can submit them. First person to finish all of them, or the person with the most points when the event ends wins. Good luck!

Ip: 10.0.0.1
